DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.Title: Update a item directly online

S1.chs: 正在连接到 NEXUS 获取文件列表

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S1: Connecting to NEXUS to get file list ...

S2.chs: 点击文件名称来获取下载地址

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S2: Click the file name to get the download address.

S3.chs: 正在连接到 NEXUS 获取文件下载地址

S6.chs: 选择要从哪个服务器下载文件

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S6: Choose server to download the file.

S7.chs: 如果你无法高速下载，请自行使用代理，记得添加域名规则：cf-files.nexusmods.com

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S7: If you can't download at high speed, please use the proxy yourself, and remember to add domain name rules: cf-files.nexusmods.com

S_10_1.chs: 评估成功，正在更新数据

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S11: Update item has been completed automatically.

S12.chs: 存在验证不通过的内容，为了避免意外情况不能自动完成，请在配置队列中手动操作，程序将自动打开解压目录。你还可以在调试窗口中查看具体的情况

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S12: There is content that does not pass the verification. In order to avoid unexpected situations, it cannot be completed automatically. Please manually operate in the deploy queue, and the program will automatically open the decompression directory. You can also see the specific situation in the debug window.

S13.chs: 正在等待浏览器完成页面加载

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S13: Waiting for the browser to finish loading the page ...

S14.chs: 正在删除临时解压的数据，请稍后

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S14: Deleting temporarily decompressed data, please wait ...

S16.chs: 解压出的内容不能自动编写安装命令，请手动编写

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S16: The decompressed content cannot automatically write the installation command, please write it manually.

S17.chs: 正在转移解压出的内容到新的项

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S17: Moving unpacked content to new item.

S19.chs: 不支持 RAR 格式的压缩文件（由于授权的问题，将永远不会考虑支持，请联系作者不要上传此格式，应使用 zip 或者 7z）

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.S19: Compressed files in RAR format are not supported (due to licensing issues, support will never be considered, please contact the author Do not upload this format, use zip or 7z.

A2.chs: 清单文件放置目录不正确

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A2: The manifest file is placed in the wrong path.

A3.chs: 暂不支持非 CDCD 命令的自动更新

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A3: Automatic update of non-CDCD commands is not supported yet.

A4.chs: 文件夹数量和 CDCD 命令数量不匹配

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A4: The number of folders does not match the number of CDCD commands.

A7.chs: 存在多重套娃或者非标准 SMAPI 模组内容

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A7: There are multiple subdirectory loops or non-standard SMAPI mods.

A8.chs: 解压出的内容不包含文件夹或文件夹是空的

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A8: The extracted content does not contain a folder or the folder is empty.

A9.chs: 检测到 manifest.json 直接存在于解压出的根位置

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A9: Detected that manifest.json exists directly in the unzipped root location.

A10.chs: 检测到原本使用 CDMAD 的文件夹现在却可以使用 CDCD

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.A10: Detected folder that used to use CDMAD, but now can use CDCD

Chromium.1.chs: 正在等待页面完成加载 ... 请不要点击下载按钮，程序将自动取出需要的参数

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.Chromium.1: Waiting for page to finish loading...

Chromium.3.chs: 无法获取到参数，请在顶部菜单中恢复任务并刷新重试，顺便请确保打开的模组页面也是已经登录状态，如果不是就再点一下登录，必须登录了才会有参数

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.Chromium.3: Unable to get parameters, please resume the task in the top menu and refresh and try again. Make sure that the opened mod page is also logged in. If not, click to log in again. You must log in to have parameters.

Chromium.4.chs: 直接更新项流程的参数检测程序已重新挂起，请刷新页面或者继续等待

DirectOnlineUpdateWindow.Chromium.4: The parameter detector of the direct update item process has been reset, please refresh the page or continue to wait

A1.chs: 重置直接更新项流程状态

ChromiumWindow.A1: Reset direct update item process state

A3.chs: 访问 NEXUS 页面 ID

StorageManagementWindow.Title: Storage Management

A2.chs: 当前计算程序正忙，请等待计算完成后进行删除数据

StorageManagementWindow.A2: The current calculation program is busy, please wait for the calculation to complete before deleting the data.

SettingsWindow.Title: Settings

A1.chs: 设置窗口打开时，你仍旧可以操作其他窗口/crlf/ 在左侧列表中选择一项来显示该类的设置项

SettingsWindow.A1: When the settings window is open, you can still operate other windows./crlf/ Select an item in the list on the left to display the settings for that class.

A6.chs: 游戏路径（支持所有版本）

A8.chs: 在第五代中，一个库可以包含多个子库，如果你的模组超级多，那么这将非常有用

SettingsWindow.A8: In Gen 5, a library can contain multiple sub-libraries, which is useful if you have a lot of mods.

A10.chs: 游戏文件备份路径（如果要使用文件替换类命令，则是必须的，否则程序会删除游戏文件）

SettingsWindow.A10: Game file backup path (required if you use CDGRF, CDVD, otherwise program will delete game file.)

A23B1.chs: 非会员请在内置浏览器登录账号才能下载模组

SettingsWindow.A23B1: Non-members need log in account in built-in browser to download mod file.

A32.chs: 保存用户调整后的界面布局

SettingsWindow.A32: Save the interface layout adjusted by the user

A33.chs: 启用管理员身份下的拖拽兼容选项

SettingsWindow.A33: Enable drag-and-drop compatibility option under admin

A34.chs: 自动选择首个 NEXUS 下载服务器（由 NEXUS 账户设置决定）

SettingsWindow.A34: Automatically select the first NEXUS download server

A39.chs: 挑选你喜欢的图标（立即生效，可能在下次启动计算机时才完全生效）/crlf/更新后快捷方式将被重置，请再手动设置

SettingsWindow.A39: Pick the icon you like (it will take effect immediately, or next time you start the computer) /crlf/ The shortcut will be reset after the update, please set it manually.
SettingsWindow.A40: Create a shortcut on the desktop

Search.10.chs: 包含的文件夹（不搜索子目录）

Search.14.chs: 不区分中英文的标点符号

SearchWindow.Search.14: No distinction chs and eng symbols
SearchWindow.Search.Title: Search

BulkCreateItemWindow.Title: Bulk creation

A1.chs: 将每个文件夹视为一个独立的模组

BulkCreateItemWindow.A1: Make each folder as a separate mod.

A2.chs: 将所选的文件夹作为一个模组

BulkCreateItemWindow.A2: Make the selected folders a mod.

A4.chs: 若要将多个文件夹创建为一个项，请输入该新项的名称

BulkCreateItemWindow.A4: To create multiple folders as a single item, enter the name of the new item.

A6.chs: 选择批量创建的操作类型

BulkCreateItemWindow.A6: Select the operation type for bulk creation.

DS.1.chs: 是否确认开始批量创建？如果有目标路径存在则不会创建，创建过程中切勿重复操作，避免文件系统冲突！

BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.1: Are you sure to start batch creation? If the target path exists, it will not be created. Do not repeat operations during the creation process to avoid file system conflicts!

DS.2.chs: 将多个文件夹创建为一个项时，必须设定这个新项的名称

BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.2: When creating multiple folders as an item, you must set the name of the new item.

DS.3.chs: 你不应该把 SMAPI 自带的模组创建到库中

BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.3: You should not build mods that come with SMAPI into the library.
BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.4: You did not select an operation type.
BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.5: You have not selected a target category.

DS.6.chs: 指定的项名称路径已存在

BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.6: The specified item name path already exists.

DS.7.chs: 不是标准 SMAPI 模组或者套娃了

BulkCreateItemWindow.DS.7: Not a standard SMAPI mod or has multiple layers of folders.

ModCheckUpdateManageWindow.Title: Mod Check Update Manage Window

A1.chs: 步骤一：向 smapi.io 发送数据

A2.chs: 步骤二：选择接收到的数据

A3.chs: 步骤三：在本地库中找到项

A4.chs: 在主窗口的【管理模组】页面中，在分类列表和项列表的右键菜单中选择【加入检查更新表】来将数据添加到列表中，或者直接拖入包含清单文件的模组文件夹

ModCheckUpdateManageWindow.A4: In the [Manage Mod] tab of the main window, select [Add to check update List] in the right-click menu of the category list and item list to add data to the list, or directly drag the mod folder containing the manifest file.

A6.chs: 发送 SMAPI 版本信息

A7.chs: 发送 Stardew Valley 版本号

A8.chs: 发送操作系统平台名称

A25.chs: 查阅从 smapi.io 返回的数据

A28.chs: 打开建议更新版本的地址

A35.chs: 额外兼容性和测试版信息

A36.chs: 添加全部条目到下一步

A37.chs: 添加选中条目到下一步

S3.chs: 正在连接 SMAPI 服务器

S9.chs: 未能找到包含此对象的项：

A2.chs: 参与用户统计，并上传这些数据

A3.chs: 参与用户统计，但不愿意上传你的数据，我们仍会收到您的公网 IP 地址

A4.chs: 不参与统计，我们不会收到你的任何数据

ChromiumVersionWarn.chs: 当前 SMUI 版本需要使用的 Chromium 组件版本号为：{1}，请记得前往维基下载对应版本的 Chromium Embedded Framework 组件安装程序，如果版本不对应，可能无法正常使用浏览器功能

DynamicText.ChromiumVersionWarn: The version number of the Chromium component required for the current SMUI version is: {1}, please remember to go to the wiki to download the corresponding version of the Chromium Embedded Framework component installer, if the version does not match, the browser function may not work normally.

TooFewRequestsRemainingInCurrentHour.chs: 当前小时剩余可请求次数过少：

DynamicText.TooFewRequestsRemainingInCurrentHour: Too few requests remaining in the current hour:

ManageMod.1.chs: 当前模组数据仓库路径不可用

DynamicText.ManageMod.1: The current Mod Repository path is unavailable.

ManageMod.2.chs: 你还没有选择要使用哪个子库

DynamicText.ManageMod.2: You haven't chosen which Sub Library to use.

ManageMod.3.chs: 请先选择一个分类（只选一个）

DynamicText.ManageMod.3: Please select a category first. (only one, not more)

ManageMod.4.chs: 为了防止你反悔，将子库发送到回收站

DynamicText.ManageMod.4: To prevent you from regretting it, send the sub-library to the recycle bin.

ManageMod.5.chs: 输入新建子库的名字，由于这是路径的一部分，所以你不能使用某些字符

DynamicText.ManageMod.5: Enter the name of the new Sub Library, since this is part of the path, you cannot use certain characters.

ManageMod.6.chs: 文件夹已存在，请重新输入

ManageMod.7.chs: 输入新建分类的名字，由于这是路径的一部分，所以你不能使用某些字符

DynamicText.ManageMod.7: Enter the name of the new category, since this is part of the path, you cannot use certain characters.

ManageMod.8.chs: 为了防止你反悔，将分类发送到回收站

DynamicText.ManageMod.8: To prevent you from regretting it, send the Category to the recycle bin.

ManageMod.11.chs: 输入新建项的名字，由于这是路径的一部分，所以你不能使用某些字符

DynamicText.ManageMod.11: Enter the name of the new Item, since this is part of the path, you cannot use certain characters.

ManageMod.13.chs: 为了防止你反悔，将项发送到回收站

DynamicText.ManageMod.13: To prevent you from regretting it, send the Item to the recycle bin.

ManageMod.16.chs: 请先选择一个项（只选一个）

DynamicText.ManageMod.16: Please select a item first. (only one, not more)
DynamicText.ManageMod.17: Please select at least one item.

ManageMod.19.chs: 目标对象路径已存在，请重新命名

DynamicText.ManageMod.19: Target object path already exists, please rename.
DynamicText.ManageMod.20: Want to create a Screenshots folder?

ManageMod.23.chs: 当前项没有富文本描述文件，是否立即创建并在写字板中打开？

DynamicText.ManageMod.23: There is no rich text description file for the current item, do you want to create it now and open it in WordPad?

ManageMod.24.chs: 无法在默认路径下找到 Windows 写字板应用程序

DynamicText.ManageMod.24: Windows Notepad application cannot be found under the default path.

ManageMod.31.chs: 目标文件存在，是否要删除目标文件再进行导出？

DynamicText.ManageMod.31: The target file exists, do you want to delete the target file and then export?

ManageMod.32.chs: 如果你忘记了设置的密码，可以到用户配置文件夹，用记事本或其他编辑器打开最后的 7za.bat 批处理文件查看即可，但是请不要运行它，防止造成意外事故

DynamicText.ManageMod.32: If you forget the password you set, you can go to the user configuration folder and open the final 7za.bat batch file with Notepad or other editors to view it, but please do not run it to prevent accidents.

ManageMod.33.chs: 当前项已经在配置队列中，请去那里进行重命名操作

DynamicText.ManageMod.33: The current item is already in the deploy queue, please go there to rename.

UpdateMod.1.chs: 输入你要进行访问的 星露谷 NEXUS 模组的页面 ID

DynamicText.UpdateMod.1: Enter the ID of the NEXUS Stardew Valley mod you want to access.

UpdateMod.2.chs: 自由输入 ID 进行更新

InstallMessage.4.chs: 所选的项都正在被其他线程处理，本线程结束，请勿重复操作，避免引起文件系统冲突

DynamicText.InstallMessage.4: The selected items are being processed by other threads. This thread ends. Do not repeat the operation to avoid file system conflicts.

InstallMessage.6.chs: 载入线程任务的项数量：

InstallMessage.7.chs: 后台线程开始创建项，请不要重复操作以避免文件系统冲突

DynamicText.InstallMessage.7: Background thread starts creating items, please do not repeat to avoid file system conflicts.

InstallMessage.8.chs: 目标项已存在，将不会创建项：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.8: Target item already exists, item will not be created:

InstallMessage.11.chs: 正在创建命令文件并自动编写

DynamicText.InstallMessage.11: Code file is creating and automatically written.

InstallMessage.18.chs: 正在复制文件夹到 Mods：

InstallMessage.19.chs: 正在复制文件夹到目标位置：

InstallMessage.20.chs: 正在覆盖 Mods 中已存在的文件夹：

InstallMessage.22.chs: 正在复制文件到目标位置：

InstallMessage.23.chs: 正在复制文件到目标位置（不带验证）：

InstallMessage.24.chs: 正在覆盖 Cotnent 文件夹

InstallMessage.25.chs: 正在验证文件夹排斥关系...

InstallMessage.27.chs: 正在撤销... 无视所有错误反向顺序执行卸载

DynamicText.InstallMessage.27: Undoing... Uninstall in reverse order, ignoring all errors

InstallMessage.28.chs: 正在删除 Mods 中的文件夹：

InstallMessage.30.chs: CDMAD 命令无法卸载，自动跳过

DynamicText.InstallMessage.30: CDMAD command cannot be uninstalled, automatically skipped.

InstallMessage.31.chs: 找到备份，正在还原文件：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.31: Backup found, files are being restored:

InstallMessage.32.chs: 没有目标备份文件，正在删除文件：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.32: No target backup files, files are being deleted:

InstallMessage.34.chs: 正在还原 Cotnent 文件夹

InstallMessage.35.chs: 卸载操作不能通过反向执行来中途撤销，这可能已经造成了预期外的问题，请仔细检查安装命令

DynamicText.InstallMessage.35: Uninstall operations cannot be reversed halfway through, this may have caused unexpected problems, please double check the installation command.

InstallMessage.36.chs: 正在将 Mods 中的文件夹覆盖到仓库内：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.36: Overwriting the mods folder into the repository:

InstallMessage.37.chs: 未能找到 Mods 中文件夹：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.37: Could not find folder in Mods:

InstallMessage.38.chs: 正在删除仓库内的文件夹：

InstallMessage.39.chs: 正在将 Mods 中的文件夹复制到仓库内：

DynamicText.InstallMessage.39: Copying the mods folder to the repository:

InstallMessage.46.chs: 项本地更新已完成，请刷新查看版本和状态

DynamicText.InstallMessage.46: Items local updated completed, please refresh to see version and status.

Deploy.1.chs: 原路径已不存在，无法保存

DynamicText.Deploy.1: The original path no longer exists and cannot be saved.

Deploy.2.chs: 要进行重命名项的目标路径已存在，请重新取名

DynamicText.Deploy.2: The target path of the item to be renamed already exists, please rename.

Deploy.3.chs: 没有可供生成的对象，请手动输入

DynamicText.Deploy.3: No objects to generate, please enter manually.

Deploy.5.chs: 请先修改所有安装命令错误，或者等待自动命令检查器刷新数据

DynamicText.Deploy.5: Please fix any installation command errors first, or wait for the auto command checker to refresh the data.

Deploy.6.chs: 项的数据内容中存在错误项，请先解决那些问题

DynamicText.Deploy.6: There are error items in the data content of the item, please fix those first.

Deploy.11.chs: CDVD 命令找不到 Content 文件夹

DynamicText.Deploy.11: CDVD command cannot find Content folder.

Deploy.12.chs: SUB 过程没有 END SUB

Deploy.13.chs: END SUB 要与 SUB 过程一起使用

DynamicText.Deploy.13: END SUB is to be used with the SUB procedure.

Deploy.15.chs: 名为 assets 的文件夹不应该出现

DynamicText.Deploy.15: A folder named assets should not appear.

Deploy.16.chs: Content 文件夹可以使用 CDVD 命令，请注意设置备份

DynamicText.Deploy.16: Content folder can use CDVD command, pay attention to setting backup.

Deploy.18.chs: 文件在任何情况下都不可能出现，你在干什么！

DynamicText.Deploy.18: file is unlikely to appear under any circumstances.

Deploy.19.chs: 压缩文件需要解压，或者你有其他需求

DynamicText.Deploy.19: compressed file needs to be decompressed, or you have other needs.

Deploy.20.chs: 使用 CDCD 命令的文件夹不准套娃，manifest.json 必须就在文件夹下

DynamicText.Deploy.20: The folder using CDCD command must contain manifest.json directly.

Deploy.21.chs: 已使用控制命令解锁允许 CDCD 套娃

DynamicText.Deploy.21: Unlocked with control command to allow CDCD multi-level folders.

Deploy.23.chs: 已使用控制命令解锁允许任何文件添加到项中

DynamicText.Deploy.23: Unlocked with control command to allow any file tcan add to item.

Sever.0.chs: 检测到绿色版模式标记文件，检查更新功能已禁用

DynamicText.Sever.0: Portable mode flag file detected, check for updates disabled.

Sever.2.chs: 获取失败或服务器上没有指定的文件

DynamicText.Sever.2: The specified file is not present on the server.

Sever.3.chs: 正在连接服务器上的文件

Sever.4.chs: 更新已下载完成，等待软件退出后自动运行安装程序

DynamicText.Sever.4: The update download is complete, the installer will automatically run after exiting the software.

Sever.7.chs: 正在连接到用户统计服务器

Sever.10.chs: 当前位于 Debug 文件夹中，检查更新自动禁用以防止在调试时浪费服务器资源

DynamicText.Sever.10: Currently in the Debug folder, check for updates is automatically disabled to prevent wasting server resources while debugging

Settings.1.chs: 选择星露谷游戏文件夹

Settings.2.chs: 选择程序自动找到的或者你可以自己浏览文件夹

DynamicText.Settings.2: Choose what the program has automatically found or you can browse the folder yourself.

Settings.3.chs: 这里没有列出，浏览文件夹来选择

DynamicText.Settings.3: Not listed here, browse the folder by yourself to select.

Settings.4.chs: 选择你的星露谷游戏文件夹

DynamicText.Settings.4: Select your Stardew Valley game folder

Settings.5.chs: 此文件夹路径下不包含星露谷的可执行文件：Stardew Valley.exe

DynamicText.Settings.5: The executable file of Stardew Valley is not included in this folder path: Stardew Valley.exe

Settings.7.chs: 你可以选择现有的模组数据仓库文件夹，如果你之前使用第四代的产品，则可以直接在下面选择。如果你还没有本产品定义的模组数据仓库，请选择第一项然后选择一个空文件夹来创建新的数据仓库/crlf//crlf/请确保你的数据仓库应该放在固态硬盘，而不是机械硬盘，SMUI 非常需要瞬间读取速度，否则 SMUI 的性能将大幅下降

DynamicText.Settings.7: You can select an existing Mod Repository folder, or directly below if you are using a 4th generation product before. If you don't already have a Mod Repository defined for this product, select the first item and choose an empty folder to create a new Mod Repository/crlf//crlf/Please make sure that your Mod Repository should be placed on a SSD, not a HDD, SMUI needs instant read speed, otherwise the performance of SMUI will drop significantly.

Settings.8.chs: 创建新的模组数据仓库，使用现有也可以

DynamicText.Settings.8: Create new Mod Repository, or use existing one.

Settings.9.chs: 继续使用第四代产品的仓库：
